## Type of Change

<!--
Use Conventional Commits format in PR title for automatic labeling.
Example: feat: add new feature, fix: resolve bug, docs: update documentation

Check all that apply:
-->

| Type | Label | Version | Description |
|------|-------|---------|-------------|
| - [ ] feat | `feature` | minor | New feature |
| - [ ] fix | `fix` | patch | Bug fix |
| - [ ] docs | `docs` | patch | Documentation only |
| - [ ] refactor | `refactor` | patch | Code refactoring |
| - [ ] perf | `perf` | patch | Performance improvement |
| - [ ] ci | `ci` | patch | CI/CD changes |
| - [ ] chore | `chore` | patch | Other changes |
| - [ ] deps | `dependencies` | patch | Dependency updates |
| - [ ] breaking | `breaking` | **major** | Breaking changes |
